description: Justin Benson (Writer/Director/Producer), Aaron Moorhead (Writer/Director/Producer), Nacho Vigalondo (Writer/Director), Gregg Bishop (Writer/Director), Marcel Sarmiento (Director/Executive Producer), David Lawson (Producer), Adam Hendricks (Producer), John Lang (Producer), Nahikari Ipi√±a (Producer), Nick Blanco (Actor), Shane Brady (Actor), Chase Newton (Actor), Greg Gilreath (Production Manager), Ryan Leonard (Production Manager), George Feucht (Director of Photography)
synopsis: Fantastic Fest alumni Nacho Vigalondo & Marcel Sarmiento join several other genre filmmaking greats in this 3rd installment of the twisted found footage horror anthology franchise.
title: V/H/S Viral
